products.title: White Blackout Blind for VELUX  skylights
products.metadescription: Some would say that this blind is too white. Those people are wrong. Being such a sharp white can only be a good thing, as it allows this blind to work like a dream in those crisp, monochromatic schemes that are so popular in homes around the country.

products.title: Elements Pure White Blackout Blind for VELUX  Windows
products.metadescription:

products.title: Roller, 1028 White - VELUX Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Roller, 1028 white - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional charg
products.productdescription: Softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience! The solar-rechargeable battery holds enough charge for up to 600 operations, even if there is no direct sunlight for recharging. Please note that the wall mounted control can also be used as a free standing remote control or if necessary, the blind can also be operated manually.

Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.
